          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Verb “to be” (Present Tense) 2</string>
            <string language="en">The Verb "to be" (Present Tens) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verb ", zum (anwesende 10) 2 zu sein"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le verbe "à être" (Dix actuels) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O verbo "a ser" (dez atuais) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il verbo "da essere" (dieci attuali) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ρήμα "για να είναι" (παρούσες δεκάδες) 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El verbo "a ser" (actuales diez) 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can practise the forms of the verb “to be”by using them in a context.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let’s Begin!</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can practice the forms of the verb "to be" by using them in a context. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let's Begin!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">Grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">verbs</string>
            <string language="sv">To be</string>
            <string language="sv">Present Tense</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Grammar</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
            <string language="en">To be</string>
            <string language="en">Gift's</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie die Formulare des Verbs üben ",
um zu sein", indem Sie sie in einem Kontext verwenden. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 1 - lassen Sie uns 
anfangen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez pratiquer les formes du 
verbe "pour être" en les utilisant dans un contexte. Safir - 
l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - le module 1 - 
commençons !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode praticar os formulários do verbo
"para ser" usando os em um contexto. Safir - vida do inglês e 
de funcionamento para novatos - o módulo 1 - deixe-nos começar!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete esercitarsi nelle forme del verbo "per
essere" usando in un contesto. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per
i principianti - modulo 1 - cominciamo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να ασκήσετε τις μορφές του ρήματος "για 
να είστε" με τη χρησιμοποίηση τους σε ένα πλαίσιο. Safir
- αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα
1 - αρχίστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede practicar las formas del verbo 
"para estar" usándolas en un contexto. ¡Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - el módulo 1 - comencemos!</string>
          </description>
